Package dataAccess

Class DBAppointments

java.lang.Object
dataAccess.DBAppointments
public class DBAppointments extends Object
This class handles SQL queries regarding appointments.

    • DBAppointments

      public DBAppointments()

  • Method Details

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAllAppointments()
      This method returns all appointments in the database in an ObservableList. An SQL query returns all appointments and columns for appointments. A new appointment instance is created for each
      appointment record using a while loop. The appointments are added to an ObservableList.
      Returns:
      ObservableList of appointments

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAllAppointments(int customerId)
      This method returns all appointments in the database that are associated to a particular customer in an ObservableList. An SQL query returns all appointments and columns for appointments where the customer ID of the appointment matched that of
      the customerID parameter. A new appointment instance is created for each appointment record using a while loop. The appointments
      are added to an ObservableList.
      Parameters:
      customerId - the ID of the customer whose appointments are returned
      Returns:
      ObservableList of appointments

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAllAppointments(Users user) throws SQLException
      This method returns all appointments in the database that are associated to a particular user in an ObservableList. An SQL query returns all appointments and columns for appointments where the user ID of the appointment matched that of
      the user ID of the user parameter. A new appointment instance is created for each appointment record using a while loop. The appointments
      are added to an ObservableList.
      Parameters:
      user - the user whose appointments are returned
      Returns:
      ObservableList of appointments
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getAllAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getAllAppointments(Contacts contact)
      This method returns all appointments in the database that are associated to a particular contact in an ObservableList. An SQL query returns all appointments and columns for appointments where the contact ID of the appointment matched that of
      the contact ID of the contact parameter. A new appointment instance is created for each appointment record using a while loop. The appointments
      are added to an ObservableList.
      Parameters:
      contact - the contact whose appointments are returned
      Returns:
      ObservableList of appointments

    • getMonthAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getMonthAppointments()
      This method returns all appointments in the database for the current month in an ObservableList. An SQL query returns all appointments and columns for appointments where the month of the appointment matches that of
      the current month. An hour interval is added or subtracted using the hourDifference method of the UsefulMethods class
      so that the beginning and end of the month in local time lines up with that of UTC time. A new appointment instance is
      created for each appointment record using a while loop. The appointments are added to an ObservableList.
      Returns:
      ObservableList of appointments

    • getWeekAppointments

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<Appointments> getWeekAppointments()
      This method returns all appointments in the database for the current week in an ObservableList. An SQL query returns all appointments and columns for appointments where the week of the appointment matches that of
      the current week. An hour interval is added or subtracted using the hourDifference method of the UsefulMethods class
      so that the beginning and end of the week in local time lines up with that of UTC time. A new appointment instance is
      created for each appointment record using a while loop. The appointments are added to an ObservableList.
      Returns:
      ObservableList of appointments

    • addAppointment

      public static int addAppointment(Appointments appointment) throws SQLException
      This method adds an appointment to the database. An appointment is added to the database with an INSERT statement. The values for the parameter indices are set using the
      associated getter methods of the Appointments class.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to be added
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected by the insertion
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • modifyAppointment

      public static int modifyAppointment(Appointments appointment) throws SQLException
      This method modifies an appointment to the database. An appointment is modified in the database with an UPDATE statement. The values for the parameter indices are set using the
      associated getter methods of the Appointments class.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to be modified
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected by the insertion
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • deleteAppointment

      public static int deleteAppointment(Appointments appointment) throws SQLException
      This method deletes an appointment from the database. An appointment is deleted from the database with DELETE statements. The value for the parameter index
      is set using the getAppointmentId method of the Appointments class.
      Parameters:
      appointment - the appointment to be deleted
      Returns:
      the number of rows affected by the insertion
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • getAllTypes

      public static javafx.collections.ObservableList<String> getAllTypes()
      This method returns all distinct appointment types in the database in an ObservableList. An SQL query returns all distinct appointment types. A new string instance is created for each
      appointment type record using a while loop. The types are added to an ObservableList.
      Returns:
      ObservableList of types

    • monthAndTypeMatches

      public static int monthAndTypeMatches(String month, String type)
      This method returns a number of appointment that match the month and type arguments. An SQL query is executed to find instances of appointments that match both the type and month parameters and calls this
      column "Count". A while loop iterates through this one record and assigns that value to the count variable which is returned.
      Parameters:
      month - the month to be searched
      type - the type to be searched
      Returns:
      the number of appointment that match the month and type arguments
